Rule.name: Make the responder become enemies with an other

InfluenceRule.name: Someone who is self-destructive will not hesitate to spread a rumor about a friend.
Someone who is a hothead will not hesitate to spread a rumor about an enemy.
If the initiator is the jealous type, the responder and other are dating, and the initiator has a crush on responder, initiator will spread rumors about other.
Someone who was cheated on by another person and who is vengeful will most likely spread a rumor about the other person.
Someone who is shy is less likely to spread rumors, in the event that it leads back to them and they have to take the heat for it.
Someone who is a weakling is less likely to spread rumors, in the event that it leads back to them and they have to take the heat for it.
Someone who is forgiving will be less likely to spread rumors.
Someone who is a pacifist will be less likely to spread rumors.
Someone who is honest will be a lot less likely to spread rumors.
Someone who is kind will be a lot less likely to spread rumors.
Someone who is an irritable type of person will be more likely to spread a rumor about an enemy.
Enemies generally want to spread rumors about enemies.
If the other person has done something lame recently, the initiator is likely to respond to this with rumors.
If the other person has done something cool recently and the initiator likes cool things, the initiator is less likely to spread rumors about the other.
If the other person has something taboo and the initiator dislikes taboo things, the initiator will spread rumors about the other.
If the initiator is desperate, will be more likely to spread rumors.
If the initiator is a bully, will be more likely to spread rumors.
If the other is popular, more people know about %o% and so more rumors will circulate about them.
If %i% is looking for trouble, he/she will tell rumors to stir up trouble.
If %i% is heartbroken and has been cheated on by the other recently, he/she is more likely to spread rumors.
If %i% is cheerful, probably has no reason to tell a rumor.
If %i% is a homewrecker and %r% %o% are dating, %i% will try to sabatoge their relationship by telling a rumor.
If %o% has done something positive to %i% recently, %i% is less likely to spread a rumor about %o%.
If %i% has done something positive to %o% recently, %i% is less likely to spread a rumor about %o%.
If %o% has done something nice to %i% recently, %i% is less likely to spread a rumor about %o%.
If %o% has done something nice to %i% recently, %i% is less likely to spread a rumor about %o%.
angry at
If r and o are buddies, r is less likely to accept the rumors.
If r and o are dating, r is less likely to accept the rumors.
If r and i are buddies, r is more likely to accept the rumors.
If r and i are dating, r is more likely to accept the rumors.
If o did something negative to r recently, r is more likely to believe the rumors.
If o did something positive to r recently, r is less likely to believe the rumors.
If o did something cool recently, r is less likely to believe the rumors.
If i is a jerk, r is less likely to believe the rumors.
If r is kind, r is less likely to believe the rumors.
If r is loyal and friends with o, r is really unlikely to believe the rumors.
If r is emotional, will be a little more likely to believe the rumors.
If r is oblivious, will be a little less likely to believe the rumors because won't be privvy to what's going on.
If r is impulsive, will be a little more likely to believe the rumors.
If r is desperate to be accepted, will be a little more likely to believe the rumors.
If r is looking for trouble, will be more likely to believe the rumors.
If r is cheerful, will be less likely to believe the rumors.
If r is has a crush on o, will be less likely to believe the rumors.
If r is annoyed with o, will be more likely to believe the rumors.
If r pities o, will be more likely to believe the rumors.
If r envies o, will be more likely to believe the rumors.
If r trusts o, will be a lot less likely to believe the rumors.
If r was cheated on by o recently, will be more likely to believe the rumors.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to spread a lie about %o% to %r% but %pron(i,was/were)% interrupted by bad timing
%i% spread rumors and destroyed %pron(i,his/her)% relationship with %o%
%r% got pissed at what %is% said %os% said about %pron(r,him/her)%
%r% didn't care for %ip% backhanded attempts to insult %o%
%i% tried to defame %op% popularity, but %os% destroyed %pron(i,him/her)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. My. God. Did you hear about %o%?
%pron(o,he/she)% %random(has four big toes,takes medication to control drooling,still wets the bed)%!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY ABOUT ME?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OH! I said... %random(you're a very attractive person,you have a winning personality,your smile turns my frown upside down)%!

Instantiation.name: SpreadRumors - Other is Popular, Initiator is Not Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: God, that %o% makes me sick!
%gender(o,He,She)%'s so cool and popular. Everyone loves %pron(o,him/her)%!
If only they knew what I knew!
Well you didn't hear it from me, but I happen to know that %gender(o,He,She)% stays up late watching instructional videos on how to be cool and popular! %gender(o,He,She)%'s nothing but a fake!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Haha %i%, you're so adorable. Try as you might, spread what you want - it won't matter.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You stupid %pejorative%!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Let me just send a quick text...
There! Now everyone in the school thinks you're less cool! Bwahahahaha...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: God, I hate you...
Ugh... %r%.. I need to vent.
It's just %o%! I'm so furious at %pron(o,him/her)%!
Not only is %pron(o,he/she)% a terrible person, %pron(o,he/she)% also %random(has smelly feet,has been lying to everyone about..)%.
%o%!! How long have you been standing there!?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Long enough! I can't believe you'd stoop so low to spread lies about me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Fine! I'll be fine never having to see you again!

Instantiation.name: SpreadRumors - Spreading rumors between two people

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%, did you hear the latest from the rumor mill?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I guess not, what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Apparently %o% %random(got pooped on by a bird and didn't realize it,accidentally posted some embarrassing pictures from a Shakespeare festival to SkimddIt,left a large notebook of hand-written poetry in the journalism room unattended,had a session with the school counselor that was accidentally broadcast over the intercom)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Holy crap, that sounds pretty embarrassing.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey guys, what are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I just heard about your hilarious embarrassing news, %o%.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: What? Who did you hear it from?
Whatever it was it isn't true. You can't trust %i% at all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know what you are talking about, everything I say is true.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I can't believe you would trust %i% over me. Whatever, I don't need to talk to you anyway.

Instantiation.name: SpreadRumors - Making matters worse between two enemies

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. Did you hear that %o%'s been going around saying you're stupid?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey %i%. Oh, and you are here too %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's all this about you calling me stupid?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I didn't say that. What's your problem?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well you were definitely thinking it. Get out of here before I really go off.
What a %pejorative%, thanks for the tip.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No problem.
Too easy.
%greeting% %r%. Hey, what's up with %o% lately?
Oh, it's just that every time I see %pron(o,him/her)% %pron(o,he/she)%'s going on about how lame %pron(o,he/she)% thinks you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you trying to pull, %i%? %o% would never say that. %gender(o,He,She)%'s my friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know, that's only what I heard.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Pff, whatever. Like I am going to listen to you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%... %shocked% did you hear what %o% said?
%gender(o,He,She)% told a whole bunch of people that you're a tool and like a total poser .

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: WHAT?! Are you kidding me? I don't understand. I thought %o% was my friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know, that's just what I heard.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe %pron(o,him/her)%. I'm going to show %pron(o,him/her)% how not lame I am.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And not stupid.
%greeting% %r%.
You know, uh... %o%.
Umm, well, %pron(o,he/she)% said, uh... that your, um... that your feet smell.
Oh. But, also... %pron(o,he/she)% said they smell like... grandma feet.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know what's going on here, but if this is some backhanded attempt to spread rumors about %o%, you're bombing pretty hardcore.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, you'll never believe what I just heard about %o%.

%gender(o,He,She)%'s %random(been saying terrible things about you behind your back.,going to be expelled for disseminating terrorist propoganda.,a total fraud. Every assignment was totally plagiarized!,got this terrible contagious disease and has been hiding it from everyone!)%
Just %random(doing my duty,trying to help,reporting what I heard)%.

Instantiation.name: SpreadRumors - Other is Popular, Initiator is Not Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: God, that %o% makes me sick!
%gender(o,He,She)%'s so cool and popular. Everyone loves %pron(o,him/her)%!
If only they knew what I knew!
Well you didn't hear it from me, but I happen to know that %gender(o,He,She)% stays up late watching instructional videos on how to be cool and popular! %gender(o,He,She)%'s nothing but a fake!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Haha %i%, you're so adorable. Try as you might, spread what you want - it won't matter.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Did you get that from one of your little videos, %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Looks like %o% just can't handle the truth.
